ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(FieldType__c, 'CheckboxGroup'), OR( ISBLANK(CheckboxGroupValues__c), NOT(ISBLANK(RelatedObject__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(NumberPrecision__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(PicklistValues__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(FieldMask__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(RadioGroupValues__c))) )
